actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to restore the rate of duty applicable to man-made fiber fabric for technical uses that was in effect under the Tariff Schedules of the United States.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to decrease the duty rate on straining cloth of a kind used in oil presses or the like, including that of human hair (nonlaminated felt of man-made fibers). Increases the duty rate on other types of such fabrics.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to restore the rate of duty applicable to man-made fiber fabric for technical uses that was in effect under the Tariff Schedules of the United States.
